Workflow.Name: Set Default fields in Onboarding table
Workflow.Description: flow to set values to Start Date, End Date, Length of Buddy, Days after match to send first nudge, Days Prior to End on Match Period in Onboarders table when Assigned Onboarder field is updated in Buddy List table.

LocalizedName.description: Set Default fields in Onboarding table

Description.description: flow to set values to Start Date, End Date, Length of Buddy, Days after match to send first nudge, Days Prior to End on Match Period in Onboarders table when Assigned Onboarder field is updated in Buddy List table.
